headline: PPA: Strong Demand Fuels Aerospace And Defense Stocks
summary: Invesco Aerospace & Defense ETF stands out as strong long-term investment with diversified holdings, sector resilience, and growth. Click to read why PPA is a Buy.

headline: RTX's Arm Secures a $141M Contract to Aid Standard Missile-2 Program
summary: RTX's unit, Raytheon, secures a $141.1 million modification contract to procure production spares for the SM-2 program.

headline: Boeing Wins $20 Billion NGAD Fighter Jet Contract, Lockheed Martin Falls
summary: Boeing wins the $20 billion NGAD contract, ensuring its fighter jet design and manufacturing capabilities remain intact. Click here to find out why BA is a Buy.

headline: 3 Reasons NOC is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Northrop Grumman shares have sunk to $489.24, producing a disappointing 8.2% loss - worse than the S&P 500’s 1.4% drop. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
